name.de: View Image - "Bild ansehen" für Google Bildersuche

short.am,ar,bg,bn,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Re-implements the Google Images' "View Image" button.
short.ca: Reimplementa els boton "Mostra la imatge" de Google Imatges.
short.cs: Re-implementuje tlačítko "Zobrazit obrázek" na vyhledávači Google.
short.da: Genindfør "Vis billede" og "Vis billede"-knappen i Google Billeder.
short.de: Dieses Plugin bringt die Schaltfläche "Bild ansehen".
short.es: Reimplementa los botón de Google Imágenes: "Ver imagen".
short.hu: Újra elérhetővé válik a "Kép megtekintése" gomb a Google képkeresőjében.
short.it: Riattiva i pulsante "Visualizza immagine" di Google Immagini.
short.ja: Google画像検索に"画像を表示"ボタンを再実装します。
short.ko: Google 이미지의 "이미지 보기" 버튼을 다시 적용합니다.
short.nl: Herimplementeert de knop "Afbeelding weergeven" in Google Afbeeldingen.
short.no: Re-implementerer Google Bilder, "Se Bilde" og knappe.
short.pl: Przywraca przycisk "Pokaż obraz" w Grafice Google.
short.pt_BR: Reimplementa no Google Imagens o botão "Ver Imagem".
short.pt_PT: Reintroduz o botão "Ver imagem" do Google Imagens.
short.ru: Возвращает в Google картинки кнопки' "Открыть в полном размере".
short.sk: Pridá tlačidlo "Zobraziť obrázok" do vyhladávača Google.
short.sl: Ponovno prikaže gumb "Ogled slike" na Google Slikah.
short.zh_CN: 重新实现 Google 图片的“查看图片”按钮。
short.zh_TW: 重新實現 Google 圖片的「檢視圖片」按鈕。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4:
ViewImage adds the "View Image" button back to the google images results page.

The code for this extension is available on GitHub: https://github.com/bijij/ViewImage
Please feel free to make any PR's or submit an issue.
long.ca,cs,da,de,es,fr,he,hu,it,ja,ko,nl,no,p:
ViewImage adds the "Search by Image" and "View Image" buttons back to the google images results page.

The code for this extension is available on GitHub: https://github.com/bijij/ViewImage
Please feel free to make any PR's or submit an issue.
